oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-09-01 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 1, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Martha Carson, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Dale Potter, Marvin Hughes, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith; Jordanaires; Martha Carson; Dale Potter; Marvin Hughes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Carl Smith -- You Are The One (Carl Smith) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces the Jordanaires -- I'm So Glad Jesus Lifted Me (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Martha Carson -- All These Things (Martha Carson) -- Carl Smith introduces Dale Potter -- Katy Hill (Dale Potter fiddle) -- Carl Smith talks -- My Dream Of The Old Rugged Cross (Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Carl Smith introduces Marvin Hughes -- I'm Looking Over A Four Leaf Clover (Marvin Hughes)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Potter, Dale; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jordanaires (Musical group); Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Carson, Martha
